<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Headband of Inspired Wisdom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=402)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 604 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn circlet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This simple cloth headband remains pristine and clean at all times, no matter the circumstances. When you invest the headband, you either increase your Wisdom score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** When you are considering a course of action, you get a gut feeling about whether it’s a good idea. You gain the effects of an [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) spell, except that you receive the result from your own instincts rather than an external source.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision (fortune);  **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You fail a saving throw against an effect that makes you confused, fascinated, or stupefied;  **Effect** The _headband of inspired wisdom_ clears your mind. You can reroll the saving throw and use the better result.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Headband of Inspired Wisdom
